definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun used as a male given name, of Latin origin, derived from the Roman family name 'Terentius'. It is primarily used in English-speaking countries as a personal identifier.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个男性名，源自拉丁语，由古罗马家族名 'Terentius' 演变而来，主要在英语国家用作个人姓名。
definitions.example_en: Terrence was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature for his groundbreaking novels.
definitions.example_cn: 特伦斯因开创性的小说荣获诺贝尔文学奖。
